basics.name: SHASHWATH V R
basics.summary: Google Certified Cloud Architect with strong foundations in DSA and Software Engineering. Skilled in building scalable cloud-native apps across AWS, GCP, and Azure with CI/CD automation via Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform. Active GDG Organizer and Microsoft Student Ambassador—passionate about designing efficient systems, mentoring peers, and delivering impactful solutions.

experience.title: Software Development Intern (DevOps/Cloud) – Rampex Technologies (Aug 2025 – Present)
bullets: Contributing to the development of an LMS portal with a focus on scalable features and UX enhancements.
Ensuring seamless integration with company workflows and CI/CD practices.

experience.title: Freelance SRE ( Site Reliability Engnr ) and SDE ( Software Development Engnr )    (Aug 2024 – Present)
bullets: Full Production Ready AWS,GCP setup to Clients with its Application

projects.name: Terminus Assess – Interactive Student Test Portal
projects.description: Full-stack platform with real-time Linux terminal integration for student assessments; automated grading reduces evaluation time by 50%.

projects.name: LANtern – Network Power Management System
projects.description: Web app to manage power for Windows/Linux systems individually or in clusters with JWT authentication; backend task scheduling optimized API usage, cutting lab/offices power management time by 80%.

projects.name: FinSense – Financial Analytics Platform
projects.description: Financial analysis tool for data-driven insights with data processing and visualization capabilities. Code Cubicle hackathon project.

projects.name: Medical Chatbot with AI
projects.description: Intelligent chatbot for medical consultations with natural language processing for patient interaction and integrated knowledge base for medical information retrieval.

projects.name: Jenkins CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Designed and implemented continuous integration/continuous deployment pipelines with automated build, test, and deployment processes integrated with version control.

projects.name: Kubernetes Deployment
projects.description: Deployed containerized applications using Kubernetes with pod management, services, and ingress controllers. Configuration management with YAML manifests.

projects.name: Proxmox Management Frontend
projects.description: Web-based management interface for Proxmox virtual environment with real-time VM and container monitoring and resource allocation features.

projects.name: PDF Page Splitter Tool
projects.description: Automated tool to separate PDF pages based on text patterns with text extraction and document manipulation algorithms. Command-line interface for batch processing.

leadership: Winner – Code Cubicle Hackathon (Microsoft, Pathway, Trae AI)
Google Developer Groups on Campus Organizer – led initiatives and guided project development
Microsoft Student Ambassador – conducted workshops and mentored peers
